TopicTitle: Fuel Lines and Flow Priority make no difference

Articles.Content:
For some reason, my fuel tanks are draining in the exact same way no matter how my fuel lines are set up or what the flow priorities are set to. I've done extensive testing with an asparagus setup. After setting up the fuel lines in completely different ways on either side of the ship, both sides drain in the exact same way, which doesn't match either of the flow diagrams shown in the VAB.

 

Is anyone else encountering this or is it just me. My version number is 1.3.1 and these are the mods I have installed


            "name": "EVAParachutes"
            "name": "KAS"
            "name": "DMagicOrbitalScience"
